* ----- ------ -------------------- ------- --------- ------------------------------
*  REG   DATA         ACCESS        READ OR  DEVICE
* INDEX  VALUE         TYPE          WRITE   ADDRESS  COMMENT (for information only)
* ----- ------ -------------------- ------- --------- ------------------------------
  ******************************** Sets DSP2 clock, sample rate and SYS clock *******************************
  0x1200 0x0014 SMbus_32inx_16dat     Write  0x34      * DSP2 Control 1(1200H):   0014  DSP2_RATE=Sample Rate 1, DSP2_MEM_ENA=1, DSP2_DBG_CLK_ENA=0, DSP2_SYS_ENA=1, DSP2_CORE_ENA=0, DSP2_START=0
  0x1201 0x0006 SMbus_32inx_16dat     Write  0x34      * DSP2 Clocking 1(1201H):  0006  DSP2_CLK_SEL=147.456MHz (135.4752MHz)
